Time.name: Time
Time.description: This IPSO object is used to report the current time in seconds since January 1, 1970 UTC. There is also a fractional time counter that has a range of less than one second.

Current_Time.name: Current Time
Current_Time.description: Unix Time. A signed integer representing the number of seconds since Jan 1st, 1970 in the UTC time zone.

Fractional_Time.name: Fractional Time
Fractional_Time.description: Fractional part of the time when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).

Application_Type.name: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
